label: Site serves AJAX requests at the required rate
description: Your site cannot serve AJAX requests at the rate required for Seating and the WordPress block editor.
actions:
Some plugins and hosts enforce a rate limit which interferes with other WordPress functionality including Seating.

If your site uses any security plugins, check if they are enforcing a limit on AJAX requests.

Contact your host provider and ask how to remove or raise the rate limit for your site.

Learn more about AJAX or contact support.
